full_text: From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @gmail.com Subject: Client Jeffrey Epstein Sent: Tue, 6 Aug 2019 15:20:41 -0400 To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Cc: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Good afternoon Mr. (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Our client, Jeffrey Epstein, has informed us that he has no toilet paper in his cell. His CPap machine was not plugged in last night, so he was unable to use it. Also, since his arrival at MCC, he has only been able to make two fifteen minute phone calls. Both times, the calls were on speaker phone, with officers present. Thank you in advance for your help. Best, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) NOTICE: This message may contain information that is privileged or confidential. If you receive this transmission in error, please notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete the message and any attachments.

text_blocks.content: From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @gmail.com Subject: Client Jeffrey Epstein Sent: Tue, 6 Aug 2019 15:20:41 -0400 To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Cc: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov

Good afternoon Mr. (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Our client, Jeffrey Epstein, has informed us that he has no toilet paper in his cell. His CPap machine was not plugged in last night, so he was unable to use it. Also, since his arrival at MCC, he has only been able to make two fifteen minute phone calls. Both times, the calls were on speaker phone, with officers present. Thank you in advance for your help.

NOTICE: This message may contain information that is privileged or confidential. If you receive this transmission in error, please notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete the message and any attachments.

additional_notes: The email contains redactions of personal information and email addresses. The document appears to be a complaint or concern about the treatment of Jeffrey Epstein while in custody.
